name: bubbo-technical-test
author: Marcos Lambir torres

scripts.firebase-init-auth: cd server/ && firebase login && firebase init

description: The objective of this technical test is to evaluate the skills of the roller in it development of a complete application using Node.js, Express, Firebase and React Native. Hopefully the developer will be able to build a REST API using Node.js and Express, integrate Firebase Firestore as a data base, and roll out a mobile application using React Native to consume and display the data from the API. Carry out technical test for the Bubbo company
